Name: Wild Wild Chess
About the game: The classical game of chess... now played in the Wild West! Play chess against your friends or versus the computer, unlock new scenarios and chess pieces and prove yourself to be the wildest gunslinger in the old west! Features: Play against the computer with 3 different difficult levels; Unlock up to 12 beautiful scenarios for you to play in; Unlock 2 more Chess Pieces, with more elaborate design and armor; Play against your friends locally or just have fun against the computer; Originally composed soundtrack to get you in the mood;
Meta Title: Wild Wild Chess: Apr 23, 2021, Minimol Games and Full Ove...
Meta Description: Looking for information on Wild Wild Chess? Check out the release date (Apr 23, 2021), developer insights from Minimol Games, and a complete game summary.
